name: HARBINGER STRATEGIES, LLC ON BEHALF OF HESS CORPORATION
sampleDescriptions: Tax proposals related to the oil and gas industry. Monitoring of energy issues related to the Fiscal Responsibility Act (FRA), the annual appropriations bills, and global oil markets.
